H0.text: A cloud releases freezing rain is the best example of weathering.

H1.text: A tree root breaking apart a rock is the best example of weathering.

H2.text: Dry weather resulting in a small harvest is the process that best exemplifies weathering.

H3.text: Sediments flow into a bay is the best example of weathering.

A4.text: wedging by plant roots, which sometimes enter cracks in rocks and pry them apart
